events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The issue has been classified under Refund due to the customer's request for returning the product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer who reported sizing issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 123456789, and I haven't worn or washed the jacket yet. I just tried it on and realized it doesnâ€™t fit.
We can process a full refund for you once the jacket is returned in original condition. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and the offer to send the prepaid label. That works perfectly for me.
The return shipment has been received and your refund has been issued to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for shopping with us.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback helps us improve.
